subject: Fishing, Commercial
Fish and Other Marine Life
lead_paragraph: To the list of life’s great mysteries, I would add one more: how long should an angler wait to cast again to an Atlantic salmon that has come up for, but not taken, your fly?
snippet: To the list of life’s great mysteries, I would add one more: how long should an angler wait to cast again to an Atlantic salmon that has come up for, but not taken, your fly?
